tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ConflictResolutionTrends (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resolution_type VARCHAR(255),
    conflict_description TEXT,
    resolution_date DATE
)
CREATE TABLE conflict_resolution_trends (  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,  report_name VARCHAR(255),  resolution_method VARCHAR(255),  resolution_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE conflict_resolution_patterns (  pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,  pattern_name VARCHAR(255),  pattern_description TEXT,  pattern_type VARCHAR(50) );

CREATE TABLE conflict_resolution_reports (
report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
report_date DATE,
resolution_type VARCHAR,
conflict_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE report_owners (
owner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
owner_name VARCHAR,
email VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE conflict_participants (
participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
participant_name VARCHAR,
role VARCHAR,
report_id INT REFERENCES conflict_resolution_reports(report_id)
)

CREATE TABLE resolution_history (
history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
resolution_date DATE,
resolution_detail TEXT,
report_id INT REFERENCES conflict_resolution_reports(report_id)
)

CREATE TABLE ConflictResolutionTrends (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  resolution_type VARCHAR(50),
  conflict_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ResolutionAnalytics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_id INT,
  analysis_date DATE,
  trend_pattern TEXT,
  resolution_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE TrendPatterns (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pattern_name VARCHAR(50),
  pattern_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ResolutionDetails (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  resolution_id INT,
  detail_type VARCHAR(50),
  detail_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ConflictCategories (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR(50),
  category_description TEXT
)
